testcase.classname: RITM02279450 - Add Caused by Change, Unauthorized
testcase.name: Verify whether Checkbox, "Unauthorized" in the "Related Records" tab underneath "Caused by Change" on the SIR form
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the ITIL view.............................................passed And type "Security Incident" in filter navigator............................passed And Cliks on the "Visible to Me" option.....................................passed And Clicks on the New button................................................passed And Take Screenshot "STRY0021103_TC02_AC" from first driver.................passed And Fill the requested by as "Manish Chaurasia".............................passed And Take Screenshot "STRY0021103_TC02_AC" from first driver.................passed And Fille the short description as "SC".....................................passed And Scroll to the submit button.............................................passed And Take Screenshot "STRY0021103_TC02_AC" from first driver.................passed When clicks on the submit button............................................passed And Store SIR number in sheet in row "2"....................................passed Then SIR should be submitted sucessfully....................................passed And Take Screenshot "STRY0021103_TC02_AC" from first driver.................passed And search created SIR......................................................passed When scroll to the update button............................................passed Then Verify field Checkbox, "Unauthorized" in the "Related Records" tab underneath "Caused by Change".passed And Take Screenshot "STRY0021103_TC02_AC" from first driver.................passed
